name: Path lines Extanded
description:
A massive PuzzleScript game with 50 levels about blocks that beam out pathlines which are the only thing the player can walk on.

This is an extanded version of Path Lines by Rosden Shadows. I send him the link to make it investigate and he really likes it and he also fixed some of the bugs I encountered. Special thanks to him !

Original : https://rosden.itch.io/path-lines

Source code : https://www.puzzlescript.net/editor.html?hack=a477b971c3a00df6c3d0093d1ebe072e
